ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle Mexican beer (such as CoronaÂ®)
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime soda (such as 7-UpÂ®)
des: "A different twist to a classic that will keep everyone coming for more! You can double or triple ingredients for more people."
ins: Pour limeade concentrate into a pitcher; stir to break into large chunks. Add beer, lemon-lime soda, tequila, and triple sec. Stir well. Squeeze half the lime into the margarita; cut the other lime half into wedges to garnish margarita glasses.
